overview: Mimi’s parents forbid her to have a relationship with Tibor as she is going to be married. When she enters university, Mimi meets a senior who happens to be Yos. At first, Mimi doesn’t know her parents’ plan for Yos to be her future husband. But then she notices her family’s kind attitude towards Yos. Then her sister tells her who Yos is. Mimi does not expect this and she declares her break up with Yos. She refuses arranged marriage eventhough Yos has declared that he sincerely loves her. She tries to get close to another student to forget Yos. Then one day Yos has an accident while rock climbing. From the accident, Mimi realises that Yos is everything to her.
title: Love Mines
